mapper.insert: insert into comment_tb(comment_id, recipe_id, user_id, content, create_dt, update_dt) values (0, #{recipeId}, #{userId}, #{content}, now(), null);
mapper.select: select ct.comment_id, ct.recipe_id, ct.user_id, ut.username, ut.profile_img_url, ct.content, ct.create_dt, ct.update_dt from comment_tb ct join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ct.user_id where ct.recipe_id = #{recipeId} order by ct.comment_id desc;

select ct.comment_id, ct.recipe_id, ct.user_id, ut.username, ut.profile_img_url, ct.content, ct.create_dt, ct.update_dt from comment_tb ct join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ct.user_id where ct.user_id = #{userId} order by ct.comment_id desc;

select ct.comment_id, ct.recipe_id, ct.user_id, ut.username, ut.profile_img_url, ct.content, ct.create_dt, ct.update_dt from comment_tb ct join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ct.user_id where ct.comment_id = #{commentId};
